#include <string.h>
#include <assert.h>
#include "cvmx.h"
#include "cvmx-key.h"
#include "openssl/aes.h"

int cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac (uint64_t *key, uint32_t bits, uint64_t *data, uint32_t dlen, uint64_t *mac)
 AES XCBC MAC RFC 3566 implementation.

int cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init (uint8_t *orgkey, uint32_t bits, AES_KEY *key, AES_XCBC_MAC_CTX *ctx)
 Multicall AES XCBC MAC Implementation.

 Multicall update function.

 Multicall final function, should be called at last.

Function Documentation

int cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac (  uint64_t *    key,
uint32_t    bits,
uint64_t *    data,
uint32_t    dlen,
uint64_t *    mac
) 
 

AES XCBC MAC RFC 3566 implementation.

Parameters:
key  Pointer to keybytes (keylength in bits should be 128)
bits  key length in bits (expected 16*8)
data  pointer to data for which MAC should be computed
dlen  data length in bytes
mac  pointer where AES XCBC MAC should be written
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

int cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_final (  AES_KEY *    key,
AES_XCBC_MAC_CTX *    ctx,
uint64_t *    mac
) 
 

Multicall final function, should be called at last.

Parameters:
key  AES_KEY that was passed to cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init function
ctx  context pointer passed to cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init function
mac  16 byte preallocated location,where mac will be written after the call
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

int cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init (  uint8_t *    orgkey,
uint32_t    bits,
AES_KEY *    key,
AES_XCBC_MAC_CTX *    ctx
) 
 

Multicall AES XCBC MAC Implementation.

Parameters:
orgkey  key byte array pointer
bits  No of bits in the key (only 128 is supported right now)
key  AES_KEY to be initialized, similar to AES_set_encrypt_key etc.
ctx  pointer to preallocated 128 byte array,opaque quantity for user.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure

int cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_update (  AES_KEY *    key,
uint8_t *    data,
uint32_t    dlen,
AES_XCBC_MAC_CTX *    ctx
) 
 

Multicall update function.

Parameters:
key  AES_KEY that was passed to cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init function
data  pointer to data
dlen  length of data
ctx  PreAllocated context that was passed to cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init function.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on failure
